author: breser
msg: Merge r10561
Make swig-wrapped svn_fs_create and svn_fs_open usable.
Votes: +1: maxb, breser, clkao; +0: kfogel

author: sussman
msg: Misc doc updates.
* www/svn_1.1_releasenotes.html:  add IRI/auto-escaping to "new features".
* CHANGES:  mention IRI/auto-escaping and BDB verbose errmsgs.
* doc/book/TODO:  add note to self to clarify mod_authz_svn section.

author: breser
msg: Python bindings build fix. Explicitly link libpython to the python
bindings.  r10410 is a trivial usage message update, included to
avoid merge conflicts.
Votes: +1: maxb, kfogel, cmpilato; +0: breser

author: breser
msg: Update the Win32 build instructions and batch file.
Patch by: Martin Tomes <lists@tomes.org>
* INSTALL
Describe how to build from the zip source file with and without building and
testing the server dso modules.  Change the Apache version to 2.0.50 as that
is what is currently easily available from the Apache web site.
* vc6-build.bat.in
Use Apache 2.0.50 as per INSTALL instructions.

author: sussman
msg: Merge r10386, r10388 from trunk to 1.1.x branch:
"Add psuedo-IRI support and auto-escaping of URLs."
** Note: r10388 was tweaked to say "@since New in 1.1", rather than 1.2.
Approved by:  +1: lundblad, sussman, kfogel
